#summary Authorship and Licensing information

!WinDriver was originally developed at eBay Europe for testing Windows software such as [http://pages.ebay.com/turbo_lister/ Turbo Lister] and the [http://pages.ebay.com/Excel_Plugin/ Excel Plug-in for eBay].

It is now an open-source project and is available under the permissive [http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html Apache License].
